dct_title_s: A new map of the province of Quebec according to the royal proclamation, of the 7th of October 1763
dct_alternative_sm: A new map of the province of Quebec according to the royal proclamation, of the 7th of October 1763 : from the French surveys connected with those made after the war / by Captain Carver and other officers of His Majesty's service.
dct_description_sm: Includes inset maps: A Particular survey of the Isles of Montreal -- Plan of Montreal, or Villemarie -- City of Quebec -- Course of the River St. Laurence from la Valterie to Quebec.
Insets show detailed city plans with tables of references to major features.
Manuscript note on verso: Major Andr√© depty. adjt. genl.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
